cumulated.pretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈(eigvec ` c0))→((eigval ` c0)` c1)∈ ℝ)

comment: The eigenvalues of a Hermitian operator are real. Equation 1.30 of [Hughes] p. 49. (Contributed by NM, 19-Mar-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
